Resume

Education

M.S. in Information Technology and Management, Illinois Institute of Technology, 2024 — GPA: 4.0

Skills

  • Languages: Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, C++, SQL
  • Frameworks: React, Spring Boot, Flask, Django, Node.js
  • Cloud: AWS, GCP, Azure
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB
  • Tools: Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform

Experience

Software Engineer Intern – Radical AI (Aug 2024 – Feb 2025)

Developed AI-driven quiz and flight management tools using LLMs, Gemini, and GCP, improving user engagement and query relevance by 20%.

Java TA – Illinois Institute of Technology (Sep 2023 – May 2024)

Led Java-based sessions for 100+ students and used Power BI to boost learning effectiveness by 25%.

Associate Software Engineer – S&P Global (Jul 2019 – Dec 2022)

Built and scaled RESTful APIs, data pipelines, and cloud-native systems. Improved product performance by 50% and system efficiency by 40% using Java, Python, AWS, and Kafka.

); }; export default Resume;
